summary: This gives modders different colors of DLC02 lanterns. DlC02 is required for this to work (else you will have hanging balls of light which are not connected to anything.)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5]YOU MAY NOT, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES OR LOOPHOLES, USE THIS FOR MODS WHICH REQUIRE PAYMENT TO DOWNLOAD AND USE. [/size][/color]

This gives modders different colors of Dragonborn DLC's lanterns. Dragonborn is required for this to work (else you will have hanging balls of light which are not connected to anything.)

This was originally a request for a project I am on but figured others could use it.

All varieties of Dunmer lanterns are in all the above colors.
author: Bethesda and Spectral Dragon
